sentences.sentence: Clearly, real interest rates respond to influences other than the savings/investment nexus.
sentences.translation: 显然，实际利率会对储蓄/投资关系之外的影响作出反应。
恭喜你们，Nexus One的用户们！

sentences.sentence: But there was ambiguity in that awkward word, nexus.
sentences.translation: 但是“联系点”这个尴尬的词语太模糊了。
